properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, SECRET) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.nextval, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?)
SELECT REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, SECRET, PROFILE_IMG FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
